scripts.platform:deploy: npm run platform:build:lambdas && cd Platform && terraform apply -var-file=".aws.tfvars" -var-file=".platform.tfvars" && cd .. && npm run platform:deploy:website
scripts.platform:deploy:lambdas: npm run platform:build:lambdas && cd Platform && terraform apply -var-file=".aws.tfvars" -var-file=".platform.tfvars"
